text: Whether or not we are blessed to have our mothers with us, we carry them in our hearts ever day. #MothersDay https://mariashriver.com/the-best-advice-my-mother-gave-me/

Today, Senator Rubio celebrates all the fantastic mothers in #Florida and across the nation who play such a crucial role in our society, and remains committed to enacting legislation which supports and uplifts the American family. Happy #MothersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqNtFnWsAUnM-p.jpg

I was so happy to see Ramona on her birthday. Ramona is battling brain cancer, and because her dad is an essential worker, she hasn't been able to see him.

Ramona, I hope you enjoyed your red velvet cake—and know I’m fighting every day to make sure you can see your dad soon. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXsKmiWX0AMXx74.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1259610538390302733/vid/480x270/JZUGk1gJK7I-Xjel.mp4?tag=13
Wishing you all a Happy #MothersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqVy-UWoAAqcMT.jpg

From the school board to the statehouse, @ChristyforCA25 has always stepped up for California's families. I'm proud to stand shoulder to shoulder with her—and hope you'll consider joining me with a donation before Tuesday's special election in CA-25: https://www.christyforcongress.org/

Today I’m thinking about the mothers who are in jail simply because they can’t afford to make bail. It’s unjust, but especially during this pandemic. It’s past time we reform our broken bail system. #FreeBlackMamas

With tens of thousands of Americans dying and millions losing their jobs, how sad it would be if we learned nothing from all that we have done wrong.
 
We must reassess the foundational institutions of American society and determine how we go forward into a better future.

My new bill would provide $2,000 every single month for the duration of the pandemic, plus 3 months afterward. We need to confront the reality that a one-time payment just isn’t enough to keep people fed. Congress must pass my bill.

No one should ever go to the emergency room and not have their needs taken seriously.

But for too many Black mothers, that's the reality when they walk through those doors, driven in part by implicit bias in our health care system.

My Maternal CARE Act would help change that.

We've witnessed the incredible strength of mothers during this pandemic—juggling working from home with helping teach their kids, all while managing the daily responsibilities that come with being a parent and running a household.

"We hate local, state, and federal governments, but we love Wall Street and big money!"

The crisis we face today is the result of 40 years of those kinds of attacks on government. 

It is time for all of us to reject that kind of thinking.

When my daddy couldn't work after his heart attack, my mother's minimum wage job saved our home. That story is written on my heart—but it's not just about my mother. It’s about millions of Americans who reach down and dig deep every day to take care of their families. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXq8fWsXgAI0xhZ.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXq8vwYWsAAuPPb.jpg

This is my story of a mother who proved the naysayers and doubters wrong every single time. On this Mother’s Day, thank you to @culinary226 for all the mothers you stand for and letting me share my story with you.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EI9Vjj7X0AEKjzV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1193265729056980993/vid/320x320/KG6GF9Yd4QijnFAq.mp4?tag=13
Thank you to mothers everywhere for being never-ending sources of inspiration, strength, and love. Happy #MothersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqnjX9WsAIKdn4.jpg

Republicans have stood in the way of expanding SNAP benefits in the last three coronavirus relief bills. As mothers report that 1 in 5 children do not have enough to eat, we must work together to expand our support for our most vulnerable. #FamiliesFirst @FCPwithGreta http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXspHslXYAIeqSq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1259645300597305344/vid/480x270/NTbpae4vQOcn8BrJ.mp4?tag=13

As we continue to remember the victims of the Santa Fe shooting, we remember Kimberly Vaughan. Kimberly was a bright student who loved to practice sign language. Today in her honor all are encouraged to try and learn something new in sign language to carry on Kimberly's memory. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXs1dwvWkAYXKjz.jpg

No one — regardless of immigration status — should be worrying about how they will get food, or support their family, or get the care they need. That is why we must work to ensure the next coronavirus relief legislation will include benefits for the undocumented.

Hoy, el senador Rubio celebra a todas las fantásticas madres en la #Florida y en todo el país, ellas juegan un rol crucial en nuestra sociedad. El senador sigue comprometido en promulgar leyes que apoyen a la familia estadounidense. ¡Feliz día de la madre! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqN4XJXQAAKLUe.jpg
We can support mothers not just today—but every day—by making childcare affordable, passing equal pay protections, and making paid family and sick leave a reality nationwide. #MothersDay

Max, it doesn’t make one a Nazi to speak out against Chinese communist govt’s murder, torture, lies, concentration camps & Wuhan coronavirus cover-up—that’s killed so many. Turning a blind eye is WRONG & rhetoric that calls POTUS Hitler is not productive. https://www.westernjournal.com/even-cnn-anchor-stunned-obamas-china-ambassador-made-outrageous-nazi-claim/

Shyamala Harris was no more than 5 ft tall, but if you ever met her you would think she was 7 ft tall. She had such spirit and tenacity and I’m thankful every day to have been raised by her. Happy #MothersDay to all the mothers, stepmothers, and mother figures celebrating today. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqF2i5WsAAPPeN.jpg

Happy Mother's Day to all women—regardless of biology—who bring heroic and unconditional love to our world. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1259507724884291592/pu/img/F4QPdA1tgMQaHkrC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1259507724884291592/pu/vid/320x400/oOZFsd14o4q7Ckm2.mp4?tag=10
Happy Mother's Day to Jane and all the mothers of this country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqNAO4X0AU1uFn.jpg

I love my mom more than anything—and like many children, it pains me that we can't be together today. Happy #MothersDay to all of the women out there who are mothers—in biology and spirit—taking care of our kids, our communities, and our country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXqVFmqXQAAOT9X.jpg
Wishing my wife Heidi, my mom Eleanor, and all the moms a Happy Mother’s Day! #HappyMothersDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXq-LftWsAooVMx.jpg

Donald Trump closed his eyes, sat on his hands, & failed to protect the American people. Congress needs to stop relying on this President to do the right thing & force him to fully use the Defense Production Act & publicly manufacture COVID-19 supplies. https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/in-the-early-days-of-the-pandemic-the-us-government-turned-down-an-offer-to-manufacture-millions-of-n95-masks-in-america/2020/05/09/f76a821e-908a-11ea-a9c0-73b93422d691_story.html

Number of Americans between the ages of 0 and 64 at risk of losing their health insurance during this crisis: 43 million.

Number of Americans 65 and older at risk of losing their health insurance: 0

That is why we need #MedicareForAll.
https://www.commondreams.org/news/2020/05/10/next-crisis-43-million-americans-could-lose-health-insurance-due-pandemic-study

Her children rise up and call her blessed;her husband, too, praises her:
“Many are the women of proven worth,
but you have excelled them all.”

Proverbs 31:28-29

I'm fighting this #MothersDay and every day for the Americans across the country who are making the hard decisions my mother made way back when. 

We need policies and programs that will support them—during this crisis and beyond.
Happy Mother’s Day to my awesome Mom and wonderful wife! @KelleyAshbyPaul http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXrXHNzXsAw66h1.jpg

5 transgender women of color have been murdered in the past month, including Nina Pop. There is an epidemic of violence against trans women of color and we need to act swiftly.

I'm pushing for more funding to address hate crimes during this pandemic. https://twitter.com/Blavity/status/1258894553077231616 QT @Blavity Her death marks the fifth trans death in the past month, and the 10th known trans killing in the U.S. this year. This must stop. #BlackTransLivesMatter http://blavity.com/nina-pop-stabbed-in-her-home-believed-to-be-10th-trans-person-killed-in-2020

An important read by my friend @RepUnderwood. Countless Black mothers should be celebrating Mother’s Day with their families today but they’re dead, in part, because of racial bias in our health care system.

Thinking about them today and every day. https://www.essence.com/feature/black-mothers-health-on-mothers-day/
